name: Store Credit & Refund M2
description: Turn refunds into revenue, apply the automated return system to scale up sales. Thank customers for shopping in your store with credit and build their loyalty.

name: Color Swatches Pro M2
description: Provide customers with the most fulfilling shopping experience possible. Enrich the Magento 2 Color Swatches functionality with a bunch of new features.

name: Generate and Import Coupons M2
description: Reduce time spent on coupon management by generating and importing an unlimited number of promo codes in a couple of clicks. Easily track coupon usage statistics and export codes for your affiliates.

name: Advanced Reports M2
description: Add Magento 2 Advanced Reports to get all important metrics for your store in one tool. Make beneficial strategic decisions with accurate reporting and grow your sales.

name: AJAX Shopping Cart M2
description: Magento 2 AJAX add to cart extension provides comfortable shopping experience. Customers can easily select configurable options and edit items in the pop-up without wasting time on page reloads.

name: Gift Wrap M2
description: Boost sales and provide a better shopping experience with Magento 2 Gift Wrap. Improve your holiday marketing strategy by applying additional services.

name: Advanced MSI M2
description: Easily split your inventory among multiple warehouses with Magento 2 Advanced MSI solution. Optimize your stock management and reduce delivery costs with a proper warehouse selection.

name: Mass Product Actions M2
description: Increase the efficiency of the catalog management. Change prices, manage attribute sets and categories, spread custom options and images, and related products. Apply bulk modifications to multiple products and tweak the actions menu to display only required actions.

name: Promo Banners M2
description: Display catchy promo banners on corresponding store pages to let customers be aware of all hot deals and specials you offer. Draw visitors' attention to specific products to trigger impulse purchases and increase an average order value.

name: One Step Checkout M2
description: Supply your Magento 2 store with a user-friendly One Step Checkout to speed up the whole shopping process and heavily enhance customer satisfaction. Create converting checkout just in a few clicks to boost store revenue.

name: Quick View M2
description: Let customers preview product information and add necessary items to cart right from the quick view window on a category page. Speed up catalog browsing process to provide customers with positive shopping experience.

name: Google Rich Snippets M2
description: Improve your search engine rankings with easy-to-set up Google rich snippets. Highlight necessary information in search results to increase your website visibility and draw highly targeted traffic to your store.

name: Product Parts Finder M2
description: Equip your store with an advanced search option. Let customers easily find necessary repair parts and components by placing year-make-model and other additional product filters on your website.

name: Order Attributes M2
description: Add an unlimited number of extra fields to your checkout page to easily collect and process additional order related data. Display all created order attributes on a handy backend grid to keep necessary information at hand.

name: Advanced MSI M2
description: Easily split your inventory among multiple warehouses with Magento 2 Advanced MSI solution. Optimize your stock management and reduce delivery costs with a proper warehouse selection.

name: Visual Merchandiser M2
description: The extension offers a wide range of options to customize product listing on category pages according to your marketing purposes.

name: Call for Price M2
description: Replace the price with flexible options. Place a link with redirection or an image instead of the button. Select the group of customers and particular categories to display the 'Call for price' button to. Easily engage customers into more activity, asking to sign up and provide more feedback.

name: Custom Form M2
description: Use this Magento 2 Form Builder to create web forms of various types to effectively collect customer info. Use a handy constructor to generate multiple forms in no time and customize each form to meet your needs. Extend functionality of your store with admin form validation feature.

name: Sales Reps and Dealers M2
description: Provide high-quality service and individual approach to each customer by including dealers in your business model. With this convenient tool, you can effectively manage the work of your sales reps and monitor their productivity.

name: Product Labels M2
description: Highlight new arrivals, as well as special products and offers to immediately draw customers' attention and grow sales up to 55%. Automatically run several marketing campaigns at a time!

name: Product Option Templates M2
description: Attract more customers to your store by providing multiple product variations with Magento 2 Custom Option. Create an unlimited number of custom option templates, and promptly assign them to your products in bulk.

name: (Pre-order) Quick Order M2
description: Boost B2B sales and increase repeated purchases with Magento 2 Quick Order extension. Enable buyers to quickly order multiple products without visiting numerous web store pages.

name: SEO Toolkit M2
description: SEO Toolkit is the all-in-one Magento 2 SEO Extension designed to make your store stand out in Google Search. Maximize your Magento SEO effectiveness: make your store more visible in search results, get more organic traffic, increase your customer flow.

name: Shipping Table Rates M2
description: Create an unlimited number of flexible shipping methods with individual rates. Use combinations of a destination address, cart weight, order subtotal and price to accurately calculate shipping.

name: Affiliate M2
description: Run full-scale affiliate programs on your website to effectively drive sales from alternative channels. Provide affiliates with promo materials and detailed stats reports. Easily manage affiliate accounts, regulate commissions and track withdrawals.

name: Cash on Delivery M2
description: Turn potential customers into regular with Magento 2 Cash on Delivery extension. Let customers make payment to a shipping carrier when receiving the good.

name: Store Pickup with Locator M2
description: Enhance customers' loyalty by providing an additional shipping option with Magento 2 Store Pickup with Locator. Drive more sales attracting buyers to your brick-and-mortar stores with a complex solution.

name: Social Login M2
description: Get more leads with social media. The extension aims to increase the number of registrations, improve customers' shopping experience, and collect consumers’ data just in one click.

name: Shipping Restrictions M2
description: Restrict shipping methods using various product, cart and customer parameters. Make your shipping process both legal and cost-effective.

name: Blog Pro M2
description: Drive more target audience to your store with Magento 2 Blog Pro extension. Enhance your promotional efforts with the powerful content marketing solution.

name: Product Attachments M2
description: Let customers get more details about products they purchase. Provide them with accurate manuals, licenses, warranties and other additional info right on product pages. Upload files of any format and use catchy icons to capture customers' attention with Magento 2 Product Attachments.

name: FAQ and Product Questions M2
description: Equip product pages with the advanced SEO-optimized FAQ section in Magento 2. Transform guests to customers by displaying well-organized info on products and services.

name: Store Credit & Refund M2
description: Turn refunds into revenue, apply the automated return system to scale up sales. Thank customers for shopping in your store with credit and build their loyalty.

name: Custom Checkout Fields M2
description: This extension helps you to perform Magento 2 checkout customization by adding extra fields of various types. Gather comprehensive order data in a convenient way both for customers and admins. Smoothly manage info in custom input forms using the order grid.

name: Promotions Manager M2
description: Simplify promotion management process with the expanded price rules grid. Now you can cut the time on promotion-related tasks by using additional actions and columns.

name: Reward Points M2
description: Encourage customers to purchase more and return to your store by implementing an effective loyalty program with Magento 2 Reward Points extension. Easily turn occasional website visitors into loyal customers.

name: Import and Export M2
description: Import and Export for Magento 2 is an all-in-one tool for a convenient store data migration, smooth connection with the ERP/CRM systems and making regular stock updates. The extension allows you to import/export any existing entity to/from Magento.

name: Abandoned Cart Email M2
description: Augment sales revenue by the increased number of completed orders. Return lost revenue by automatically sending catchy reminders. Enhance customer loyalty by offering discount coupons.

name: GeoIP Redirect M2
description: Automatically redirect customers, change currency and language depending on visitors’ location. Use Magento 2 GeoIP extension to expand your business across other countries without creating a separate store.

name: Stripe Payment M2
description: Provide your customers with a safe and seamless payment experience. Let your customers pay via a wide range of payment methods with no need to implement a custom integration endpoint for each one.

name: Instagram Feed M2
description: Attract target audience to your website and boost revenue with Magento 2 Instagram Feed extension. Integrate eye-catching Instagram pictures to effortlessly create a trendy look for a website.

name: Automation Rules for RMA (Add-On) M2
description: Speed up the processing of RMA requests and reduce the load on your admins with RMA Automation Rules add-on.

name: Security Suite M2
description: Employ Magento 2 Security Suite extension to ensure your webstore protection from hacker attacks and other malicious security threats. Enhance store management performance getting full visibility of all backend activities.

name: PDF Customizer M2
description: Easily create custom invoices without any programming skills with Magento 2 PDF Invoice. Save your time on converting HTML code to PDF templates to send invoices, orders, shipments and credit memos to your customers.

name: Reindex from Admin M2
description: Reduce time on keeping your store data up-to-date. Prevent the store from lags and cart abandonments in one click without developers' help.

name: Lazy Load M2
description: Speed up the loading time of your site pages with Magento 2 Lazy Load. Improve your site performance by loading product images by demand!

name: Multiple Coupons M2
description: Increase customer loyalty by enabling registered clients and guest visitors use numerous discount coupons for one order.

name: Visual Merchandiser M2
description: The extension offers a wide range of options to customize product listing on category pages according to your marketing purposes.

name: Pre Order M2
description: Drive sales for out of stock or just announced products! Allow buyers to easily pre order or backorder goods that are unavailable for immediate delivery. Get a powerful marketing research tool to analyze customers’ demands.

name: Cross-Sell / Upsell Products M2
description: Increase trust in your shop by delivering offers with a higher value to customers. Use Magento 2 Cross Sells extension to increase the number of spontaneous purchases, average cart value, total sales and customer satisfaction.

name: Advanced MSI M2
description: Easily split your inventory among multiple warehouses with Magento 2 Advanced MSI solution. Optimize your stock management and reduce delivery costs with a proper warehouse selection.

name: Google Page Speed Optimizer M2
description: Magento 2 Speed Optimization improves web pages performance in order to place your store at the top of Google search rating. Boost your webstore traffic by the speed optimization and get an endless stream of new visitors!

name: Cross Linking M2
description: With the Magento Cross Linking plugin, it becomes easier to improve information architecture of your web store to meet the highest requirements of both Google and your customers. Replace the extended keywords with internal and external links to increase the SEO value of your store.

name: Efficient Order Export M2
description: Easily manage orders export. Configure flexible export profiles and gather all valuable order data, including the data generated by third-party extensions.
